trans-unit.target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000010_CID<tab>Ah, excellent timing! We've just finished our work on the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var>. She's so much improved, I've decided to give her a new name to suit:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000020_CID<tab>The <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise Excelsior<var 1A 01 /var>! Or simply the <var 1A 02 /var>Excelsior<var 1A 01 /var>, if pressed for time.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000030_CID<tab>Once again, she'll carry Eorzea's protectors into battle!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000040_WEDGE<tab>All aboard!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000050_EDMONT<tab>I can do no more than see you off with prayers for your safety and success.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000060_EDMONT<tab>Yet know that wheresoever you may go, my son's spirit goes with you. May the Fury grant you strength!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000070_AYMERIC<tab>Return to us─all of you!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000080_CID<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise Excelsior<var 1A 01 /var>...engage!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100010_CID<tab>This is it! Get ready!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100020_ESTINIEN<tab>Eye of mine enemy! Render unto me thy power!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100030_ESTINIEN<tab>Ugh... No... You will not claim me! I am the master!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100040_CID<tab>Yaaaaaargh!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100050_ALPHINAUD<tab>We're through!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100060_BIGGS<tab>Chief! We've got an imperial battleship on our tail! And it's bleedin' <var 1A 02 /var>massive<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100070_CID<tab>Damn it! The bastards were waiting for us to open the door for them!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100080_CID<tab>I'm going to try to shake them! Hang on to something!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100090_WEDGE<tab>Uwaaaaaah! We're all going to die! Tataruuu!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100100_BIGGS<tab>She won't take much more of this!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100110_ICEHEART<tab>The time is come to use Hydaelyn's gift.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100120_ICEHEART<tab>Much blood has been spilled in my name. And for what? For a false cause that I created for want of the warmth of companionship.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100130_ICEHEART<tab>Saint Shiva...Hraesvelgr... Pray forgive this fool.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100140_ICEHEART<tab>But even now, I cannot let go of my dream─my dream of a tomorrow in which no child need freeze alone in the snow.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100150_ICEHEART<tab>Thank you, Hraesvelgr.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Is that...Ysayle? What does she mean to do!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100170_ICEHEART<tab>O goddess born of mine own hopes and dreams. For the last time, I beseech you!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100180_ICEHEART<tab>Fill this vessel with your light! Still the hatred within our hearts and bless us with eternal grace!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100190_ICEHEART<tab>Farewell, Warrior of Light. And thank you─for showing me the way.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100200_ALPHINAUD<tab>NOOOOOO!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100210_YSHTOLA<tab>This aether... It was a Crystal of Light.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100220_YSHTOLA<tab>She, too, was one of Hydaelyn's chosen...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100230_ESTINIEN<tab>Fare you well, my lady.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200010_REGULA<tab>Our objective lies at the heart of the isle.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200020_REGULA<tab>The Third will remain to guard the ship, while the Second patrols the perimeter and eliminates any threats.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200030_REGULA<tab>The First will come with me to secure the research facility.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200040_REGULA<tab>Let no man doubt the import of our mission: the Allagans found a means to capture eikons alive, and their knowledge lies hid upon this isle.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200050_REGULA<tab>If we can but acquire it, we would be able to prevent the beings from returning to plague us, thus ending the cycle of rebirth.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200060_REGULA<tab>I need not remind you that success will raise our legion high in the Emperor's regard.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200070_REGULA<tab>Yet, by the same token, His Radiance does not tolerate failure. That is all. All troops, prepare for deployment!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200080_YSHTOLA<tab>So that is their purpose.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200090_ALPHINAUD<tab>To think that the knowledge used to bind no less a being than Bahamut sleeps here...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200100_YSHTOLA<tab>Imprisoning a primal in such a manner would represent an effective means to halt the cycle of summoning─were it not for the grave and obvious risks.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed. We need but refer to past experience─that of Bahamut's calamitous return─to see why this is not the solution we seek.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200120_YSHTOLA<tab>Held in duress, a primal will continue to nurse its hatred for mankind. And when it inevitably breaks free, its rage will be beyond quelling.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200130_ESTINIEN<tab>Whatever folly the Garleans mean to commit, they can wait. We must remain focused on our task.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Yes, of course. It would not be polite to keep the archbishop waiting.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_300010_REGULA<tab>That would explain my men's silence.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_300020_REGULA<tab>We meet again. And this time, we will not be interrupted.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_300030_REGULA<tab>Come! Show me your power, champions of Eorzea!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400010_REGULA<tab>I had heard the tales of your strength, Warrior of Light. And now that I have experienced it firsthand, van Baelsar's defeat seems less inexplicable.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400020_REGULA<tab>You are a formidable foe, and I have thoroughly enjoyed our time together. Alas, all good things must come to an end. Allagan secrets await, and there is no profit to be had in remaining here.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400030_REGULA<tab>Keep them occupied!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400040_ESTINIEN<tab>Coward...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400050_YSHTOLA<tab>It would seem we have no choice.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400060_ALPHINAUD<tab>You must continue on. We will hold them here.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400070_ESTINIEN<tab>Take the Eye. It should still hold enough energy to be of use to you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400080_ESTINIEN<tab>I shall join you as soon as I am able.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400090_YSHTOLA<tab>Enough talk! Make haste and stop the archbishop!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500010_TIAMAT<tab>(-???-)Who cometh to this forsaken place and disturbeth my solitude?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500020_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Tiamat, my child.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500030_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)...Father? Can it truly be you?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>None other. My form is such that I may journey with Hydaelyn's chosen─
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500050_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>A mortal who desireth to end the war between man and dragon.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500060_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Millennia have passed since I was brought low by the men of Allag. To think that war rageth still between our kinds...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500070_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Hearken to my tale, child of man. I am Tiamat, of Midgardsormr's first brood.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500080_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)In a time before time, my father did come to this star, bearing seven eggs.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500090_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>From these eggs did my children hatch. And once they were full-grown, they took wing and spread across all the lands of Hydaelyn.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500100_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Together with my brood-brother Bahamut, I journeyed south to Meracydia. And together, we brought forth innumerable children into the world.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500110_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)We abided in peace, and all was well...until the men of Allag came, some five thousand years since. They slaughtered my children in droves, and took from me my beloved Bahamut.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500120_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)'Twas then, when I had fallen into the depths of despair, that black-robed men came unto me. The Ascians.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500130_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)They offered to resurrect Bahamut through their dark arts, and I, in my grief, accepted─a decision which I shall regret unto my dying breath.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500140_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)For what they brought back was a mockery of my beloved. Worse, the Ascians gifted his murderers the means to entrap him.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500150_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Know this, child of man: the beings thy kind call gods are but specters of thy mind's creation, given form at great cost to Hydaelyn.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500160_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Many such beings yet slumber across the land, brought to heel by the selfsame empire that bound me. They must not be released into the world.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500170_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)If thou wouldst end the conflict, vanquish thee the Ascians, and deliver the weak of will from the bonds of their dark influence.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500180_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>It hath been five thousand years, my child. Wilt thou not forgive thyself?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500190_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)The release of death is denied me here, yet I desire not freedom. Nay, Father. I shall live with my regret until the world itself hath ceased to be.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500200_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Such is my just punishment for consorting with Darkness─for calling forth a loathsome and lamentable creature which blackeneth my beloved's memory.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600010_HYDAELYN<tab>Warrior of Light. Beloved <var 08 E905 ((daughter)) ((son)) /var>.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600020_HYDAELYN<tab>The Light abideth within thy heart again.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600030_HYDAELYN<tab>Full valiantly didst thou overcome thy many trials.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600040_HYDAELYN<tab>But glory not in thy success.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600050_HYDAELYN<tab>For the servants of Darkness are ever close at hand.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600060_HYDAELYN<tab>Receive of me my blessing once more,
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600070_HYDAELYN<tab>And go forth, to shine thy Light on all creation.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700010_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Thou hast broken down the wall I built around thee, and partaken of thy mistress's blessing once more.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700011_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Strong art thou, mortal─stronger than any other of thy kind.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700020_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Having looked upon thy deeds, I am convinced. Thou art worthy to bear Her Light.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700030_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>The covenant bound me to thee, but 'twould seem our fates were mingled from the first. Though I will not fight thy battles, I will yet lend thee my wings.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Come, mortal─we go to cast out the Darkness!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800010_LAHABREA<tab>The champion of Hydaelyn.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800020_IGEYOHRM<tab>Tell me: why do you despise the primals so?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800030_IGEYOHRM<tab>They are the embodiment of mortal will─of mortal desire.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800040_IGEYOHRM<tab>Plainly, you <var 1A 02 /var>desire<var 1A 01 /var> a foe to despise. And 'tis well that you do, for it is from the vortex of ceaseless conflict that Lord Zodiark shall be reborn.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800050_LAHABREA<tab>Through the Joining, the world shall become whole again.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800060_LAHABREA<tab>Then all shall be as once it was─as it should ever have remained.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800070_IGEYOHRM<tab>For the glory of Lord Zodiark.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800080_LAHABREA<tab>Your meddling ends here and now, Warrior of Light!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900010_LAHABREA<tab>Such strength! It defies all reason...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900020_IGEYOHRM<tab>No! I will not be bested by the likes of them!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900030_IGEYOHRM<tab>Lahabrea! It is time!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900040_LAHABREA<tab>Very well. Let us show these mortals the true power of the Echo...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900050_LAHABREA<tab>The power to break down the barriers of existence!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900060_IGEYOHRM<tab>I am become you...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900070_LAHABREA<tab>...And we are become one.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900080_ASCIANPRIME<tab>Come, mortals! Render up your souls, that Lord Zodiark might be reborn!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00010_ASCIANPRIME<tab>Aaargh!!!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00020_ASCIANPRIME<tab>What walls are these? Arrrgh! Damn you, Hydaelyn!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00030_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>That <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> might regain the blessing of Light I had foreseen...<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00040_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>But <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> is grown so strong in it as to deny us our power.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00050_IGEYOHRM<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Let us withdraw, Lahabrea. That power remains to us, at least.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00060_IGEYOHRM<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Impossible!<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00070_IGEYOHRM<tab>Aaaaaahhh!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00080_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>So you harnessed the Eye's power... A pity you spent it all. What will you do now, hero?<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00090_THORDAN<tab>So, not even the vaunted Warrior of Light can unmake an Ascian without relying upon mortal contrivances.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00100_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>You!<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00110_THORDAN<tab>In the distant past, King Thordan and his knights twelve fought and defeated Nidhogg.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00120_THORDAN<tab>Though the victory cost them dear, they were rewarded with a great prize: the dread wyrm's eyes, both of which have since been held in the Holy See's safekeeping.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00130_THORDAN<tab>The Eye you possess was Nidhogg's left, and long has it served as the source of the Azure Dragoon's might. As for its twin...

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00140_THORDAN<tab>It has lain here, joined to the person of Haldrath, the first Azure Dragoon. For though he learned to harness its power, he was ultimately consumed by it. Even in death, his body decays not─a pitiful end for a fabled hero.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00150_THORDAN<tab>My Ascian friend. Long have you and your kind sown the seeds of chaos by teaching mortals the secrets of summoning.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00160_THORDAN<tab>But if you assumed that we would meekly serve as your pawns, then you are gravely mistaken.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00170_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>You would raise a hand against us!?<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00180_THORDAN<tab>By taking unto my flesh the soul of the legendary King Thordan, I am become a god─
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00190_THORDAN<tab>A god who knows not cessation, whose being is sustained by a millennium of fervent prayer and the Eye's nigh-bottomless reservoir of aether.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00200_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>What!?<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00210_THORDAN<tab>Your contempt for man has proven your undoing, Ascian. For my first act as god-king, I do hereby sentence you to die.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00220_LAHABREA<tab>Aaaaaargggh!

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00230_THORDAN<tab>Gods feed upon aether. It matters not what form that aether takes. Ascian souls are no exception. With this power, I shall put an end to a thousand years of conflict.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00240_THORDAN<tab>Be they sown by Ascian, dragon, or primal, wheresoever the seeds of chaos threaten to quicken, I shall excise them with my divine blade and bring order to the world.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00250_THORDAN<tab>I am become that which you abhor, Warrior of Light. If you would take issue with my godhood, I shall answer you with my blade.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00010_ZEPHIRIN<tab>Brothers! The time is come to call upon the true power of the Heavens' Ward!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00020_THORDAN<tab>Fight me if you will, Warrior of Light.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00030_THORDAN<tab>I care not. All who stand against me will be destroyed─ be they servants of the Darkness or the Light.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00040_THORDAN<tab>By my blessing shall all men be sanctified, and an endless era of peace begin. Vice and conflict shall cease to be.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00050_THORDAN<tab>You reject my divinity, yet what have you to offer my people in its stead? Bitter truth? Virtuous suffering?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00060_THORDAN<tab>No matter. If you believe your cause just, I call upon you to defend it with your life!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00010_THORDAN<tab>How...how can this be? A millennium of prayer and the Eye's power combined─and still you stand?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00020_THORDAN<tab>Who─<var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var> are you?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00030_ESTINIEN<tab>...It is over, then? I had hoped that mine would be the hand to end it...but knowing you, there was little chance of that.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00040_ESTINIEN<tab>'Twould seem the Eye has served you well.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00050_ESTINIEN<tab>Its twin... At long last...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00060_ESTINIEN<tab>All that remains is to take them beyond the reach of man and dragon both. With this task accomplished, my toils shall finally be at an end.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00070_NIDHOGG<tab>Thou hadst done well to resist mine influence, bathed in my power and blood as thou wert.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00080_NIDHOGG<tab>Alas, in thine anticipation of comfort, thou hast lowered thy guard!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00090_NIDHOGG<tab>The keening of my fallen kindred... Their smoldering desire for vengeance...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00100_NIDHOGG<tab>Mine eyes have partaken of a thousand years of pain─a pain which I shall bestow upon thee.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00110_NIDHOGG<tab>Drink deep of my rage, mortal...AND BECOME ME!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00120_ESTINIEN<tab>Grrraaarrrgh!!!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00130_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Nidhogg, my child... What hath thy fury made of thee...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00140_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Let us away, servant of Hydaelyn.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00010_WEDGE<tab>Chief! Over there!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00020_BIGGS<tab>Oi!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00030_CID<tab>Haha! Godsdammit, do you always have to cut it so bloody close!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00040_YSHTOLA<tab>It would seem <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> has done it again.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Was there ever any doubt?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Let us return to Ishgard. Our friends will be eager to learn the battle's outcome...and welcome back their champion.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00070_YSHTOLA<tab>Where is Estinien?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00010_AYMERIC<tab>I daresay you are the first soul in Ishgardian history to arrive in our city upon dragonback. This scene shall be remembered for a thousand years to come.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00020_ALPHINAUD<tab>As we had feared, the archbishop summoned the soul of King Thordan unto himself and thence became a primal.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00030_YSHTOLA<tab>But he and his knights are no more, thanks to the Warrior of Light.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Your struggles are not yet over, mortals.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00050_AYMERIC<tab>Whom do I have the pleasure...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00060_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>I am Midgardsormr. I have journeyed with Hydaelyn's champion and observed <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> deeds in the conflict between man and dragon.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00070_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Tell me, children of Thordan. Do you desire peace?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00080_AYMERIC<tab>My people have committed unspeakable atrocities against dragonkind─even against our own. Would that we could undo these wrongs...but we cannot.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00090_AYMERIC<tab>Be that as it may, the future yet presents a chance to begin anew. Our nation has broken free of the shackles of a false faith, and Nidhogg shall lead his kindred against us no more.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00100_AYMERIC<tab>I doubt not that it will require much effort and perseverance, but 'tis my belief that, in time, Ishgard will again become a place where man and dragon may abide together in harmony.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00110_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>I shall remember thy words.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00120_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Yet be warned: Nidhogg's soul liveth on.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00130_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>His unbridled rage hath claimed for its vessel the one thou callest the Azure Dragoon.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00140_AYMERIC<tab>Estinien!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00150_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Doubt not but that Nidhogg will call out to his brood ere long, nor that they shall answer him.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00160_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Steel yourselves, for the true test is yet to come.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00170_AYMERIC<tab>Come what may, we will never cease to believe.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00180_AYMERIC<tab>Upon the souls of they who have sacrificed themselves to pave the way for peace, we will never abandon our cause.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00190_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>A thousand-year war cannot be ended in a day. It may take generations. What thou dost begin, thy children must continue.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00200_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Entrust unto them thy hopes and dreams, that peace may reign again...and forevermore.
